parameter.name: product
parameter.description: The name of the product that the component must be added to.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: The description of the new component.

parameter.name: defaultAssignee
parameter.description: The login name of the default assignee of the component.

parameter.name: defaultCC
parameter.description: An array of strings with each element representing one login name of the default CC list.

parameter.name: defaultQaContact
parameter.description: The login name of the default QA contact for the component.

parameter.name: isOpen
parameter.description: 1 if you want to enable the component for bug creations. 0 otherwise. Default is 1.
